title: Pixel 3 turning on camera and stuck in restart loop
content:
Hello, 

My Pixel 3 randomly started launching its camera today. While the camera would be open, the power pop-up screen would also display and it was frequently pulsing on the screen as the phone was vibrating. It also got itself stuck in a restarting loop where the phone would turn black and then display the google logo but would not progress from there and would instead turn black again and repeat. I was able to break the loop by restarting the phone and entering safe mode, but about 5 minutes later the camera self-launched again and continued with the same issue described above. After one of the restarts it did stop and has been working normally for the past 10 minutes or so. 

I did not recently download any new applications so I doubt that could be a reason behind it. 

Do I need to update software or do anything to ensure this issue is actually resolved? Is this an issue to speak to my wireless provider about/ have them look at the phone in store? I want to prevent this from starting all over again soon as I'm concerned it isn't truly fixed yet. 

Thanks.
